chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
yes
cool! i'm at the starting point now, there's a twig leading to a small island with a tiger on it to my left
which route do you suggest we take?
the twig to the butterfly
sweet! so just to confirm, i'm heading southeast towards the small island with the butterfly, right?
yes
done, now i'm on the butterfly island! where to next, boss?
go across the water to the frog
alright! heading southeast to the island with the frog, crossing those 3 rocks
let's go! where to next?
cross the bushes to the alligator
gotcha! so i'm stepping left to meet our friend the crocodile, right?
yes
alright, done! i'm hanging out with the crocodile
what's the next move?
move towards the giraffe
roger that! so i'm going back to the same island with the elephant and then heading west to the giraffe, right?
yes
done deal! now with the giraffe
what's our next move, friend?
cross the water to the snake and youve arrived!
alright, heading southeast to the snake
so, after the snake, do you want me to head east?
yes
perfect! took two steps east and voilà! i've found the treasure

*finished*
thanks for the guide, couldn't have done it without you, mate!
hey, estas listo?
yes
alright, let's start. take a few steps to your left, but stop before you reach the wooden bench
see the trail near you? cross it towards the florist stand. don't get distracted by the flowers though!
okay whats next
alright, now pull a 180
head back towards our furry friend, the white dog, crossing back over the trail. don't lose sight of him!
perfect, next?
next you're going to make your way south, crossing over the branch
be careful not to trip!
whats next
spot the second dog? you're going to head towards him until you reach the checkered picnic blanket
just don't snag any sausages, okay?
okay
now step onto the picnic mat, but be careful not to squash the berries, head west after that!
oajy great
craving for adventure? there's another branch for you to cross, this time head north!
whats next
alright, see that bush? let's take a little detour around it from the right and make our way to the florist stand
steer clear of any thorns!
perfect
now hang a left after the florist stand, you'll find yourself heading towards a bridge
no time for sightseeing though, we're passing it to the west!
whats next
up ahead, you'll see a couple of elderly folks reading
past them but don't forget to say hello!
hi! whats next
now head south again, between our new friends and another wooden branch
notice anything green near the end of it?
yes, whats next
perfect, you're gonna take a right now, go east between the branch and the green bush
okay great
walk a bit to the east and hey, what do you see? isn't it a young deer, all brown and pretty?
yes
awesome! well done exploring, mate
be sure to give our deer friend a friendly wave!
hi! whats next
enjoy the moment, friend! you've reached your final destination
give yourself a pat on the back, you did it!
hey!!! ya comenzamos?
yes
awesome! okay, we're starting from the tent in the north
i see a dog sitting left of a fire. which way should i go?
go towards the fire and past the mushrooms
got it! moved past the fire and the red mushroom
i see a blue car here. what's the next move?
move down towards the telescope
alright, i'm at the blue telescope now
what's next, boss?
move forward to the cabin and youve arrived!
sweet! and there it is, the house surrounded by rocks, we made it! *finished*
hi there! que comience el juego!!
yes

awesome! so you're near the palm trees, right? start by heading under the first palm tree towards the south-west. turn right to cross the second palm, then pull a sharp left before hitting tree number three
keep going south, pal. trust me!
yes
great! now, go a bit left to avoid our cute brown puppy buddy
then, see a tiny bit left, right after you might need to turn back to the south. pretty sneaky, right?
yes
perfect! now, you're gonna see a big rock on your left and a smaller one on your right
go right through in between. it's like threading a needle!
yes
great! now you've hit the water, forward march
don't be scared by the big red crab! just take a swift right, moving west with the rock as your guide
yes
smooth sailing! now spot a medium rock. after passing that, beware of a 'shark alert' in the water
make a sharp right. got it?
yes
okay great! you've made it! now head back onto dry land, slip between the rock and the eye-catching blue-yellow-white ball you see ahead
head straight north
yes
alright! now, slightly veer left and move towards the north-west
you'll see a red tent to your left and a giant speaker on your right. cool, huh?
yes
sweet! let's swing by that tent
arc around it, then continue south, just like a boomerang!
yes
perfect! now you might see the sea again, tempting isn't it? but resist! head right just before you hit the shore
you'll pass under a red kayak. cool, right?
yes
alright! now take a sharp right turn, go along the kayak until you see a green bush
once you reach that, you're done! you did great!
yes
woohoo! you made it! congratulations, you're a pro! thanks for a good game
yay
¡Ha sido un placer guiarte, aventurero! juguemos de nuevo en algún momento
¡Cinco altos!
bye!
bye buddy! keep exploring!
